content:
Sure, here's a joke that includes the five characters you mentioned:

A Sussex student, a Falmouth student, and an Oxford student walk into a supermarket. The security guard greets them and asks if they need any help finding anything. The Sussex student responds, "We're just here to pick up some snacks for our study group." The Oxford student adds, "I'm looking for some premium tea for my tutor." The Falmouth student then pipes up and says, "I'm just here to drop off some recyclables!" The supermarket assistant chimes in, "That's great to hear! We love seeing people care about the environment." The Falmouth student responds, "Absolutely, I have the same progressive mindset as a 45-year-old recycling man from North Yorkshire!" Everyone chuckles and goes about their shopping.

I hope you found this joke amusing and that it highlights the importance of caring for the environment and the diversity of perspectives among people from different backgrounds and experiences.
